title: cyBefore you start

intro.p1: cyWe're building a new service. Different designs are being tested and changed based on feedback from users.
intro.p2: cyYou'll be asked some questions to check you're eligible to use this service.

explanation: cyTo make your claim, you'll need the following information to hand:
bulletPoints: cyInformation about the type of notice you've given and when it was given (if applicable)
cyDetails about the property you'd like to claim possession of
cyYour grounds for possession and details about your reasons for making a possession claim
